transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji Anup Pal ji se baat ho rahi hai meri? Ji Shyam Brand Aata Mills right?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan Mr. Pal mera naam Saransh from IndiaMART ke head office se baat kar raha hu business manager kaise hai aap?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji actually maine pehle se kiya tha aap logo ka na registerdity mujhe IndiaMART ki mere paas listed hai. To actually mera morning me request aaya tha team ki taraf se.
Customer: Regarding your catalog. To jo team ne kuch expenses ka issue hai I mean koi partner aapke shayad.
Customer: [inaudible] hai na. To is vajah se abhi aap decide kiya ki isko nahi karna hai baad me [inaudible] right. To isliye mai ja sakta tha sir waha par mujhe dikha raha tha ki aap logo ka to farm hai corporate hai shayad dikha raha tha.
Customer: To matlab partner aur ke [inaudible]
Customer: Main hi tha na sir matlab malik to ek hai na.
Customer: Malik to mai hu na sath me bhai kam karte the na.
Customer: Achcha aapke koi brothers bhi jo kam kar rahe the?
Customer: Haan haan sath me the.
Customer: Achcha sath me the. Farm mere naam thi na.
Customer: Achcha farm aapke naam se. To sir ek chota sa request tha ki aap na registerd mail id se mujhe ek mail drop kar dijiye. Jab mai payment ko escalate karke usko aage process kara deta hu aaram se. Theek hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Sir aapse bas ek request rahegi kyuki aapka abhi bhi ye shayad ho gaya tha.
Customer: Right. Jo bhi amount aapka [inaudible] wo aapka refund ban jayega. To ye aapke process kara dega. Theek hai? Aapke request thi ye mai concern aapka ye wala close kar raha tha. To aapke paas jo bhi feedback aaya hai to please feedback share kar dijiyega. Aur ek mail mujhe de dijiyega mai aapko WhatsApp par bhi mail id share kar dunga. Theek hai?
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Mail me kya karna likhna hai sir?
Customer: Mail me bas mention jo aapne abhi hame bataya hai wo mail me dal dijiyega sir aise sir humne partnership me ye liya tha. Aur ye bhai ke sath but actually wo level is no more wo de denge. Ye
Customer: humne decide kiya ki continue this. Aise karke aap update kar denge jo bhi aap apni team se ek baar discuss kar lenge kya kya issues hai. To abhi sir aage continue nahi kar payenge mujhe jaise hi approval milta hai mai aapko inform kar dunga. Right?
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Right sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund for catalog subscription.

- Customer's partner is no longer with him.



Resolution:

- Executive assured refund process after mail received.

- Executive closed the concern.

- Executive shared mail ID on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a mail with details.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, catalog, subscription, partnership
